Class XMLFileReader

java.lang.Object
  at.woli.xml.XMLFileReader

public class XMLFileReader
extends Object

XMLFileReader reads a XML file and pare it into an XMlData object.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Wolfgang Nitzlnader
